hints.content:
Dan brought $\tealE{36}$ vanilla cupcakes and $\goldE{49}$ chocolate cupcakes

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c1e215c773d59594fb83ba246e89f08485c3da00)

$\tealE{36} + \goldE{49} = \maroonD{85}$

Dan's friend brought $\blueE{5}$ more cupcakes.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/71eaeb1f5396b03b8b0457b93c1f399f65695598)

$\maroonD{85} + \blueE{5} = \purpleD{90}$

There were $\purpleD{90}$ total cupcakes.
The bake sale had $\purpleD{90}$ total cupcakes.

question.content:
Dan brought $36$ vanilla cupcakes and $49$ chocolate cupcakes to his school bake sale. Then his friend brought $5$ more cupcakes.

**How many total cupcakes did the bake sale have to sell?**    

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] cupcakes
